SELECT * FROM TRIL_PRODUCT WHERE PD_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2021-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2021-01-03') ORDER BY PD_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: insert into Tril_PRODUCT(pd_seq, pd_name, pd_price, pd_keyword, pd_startDate, pd_endDate, pd_cnt, pd_theme, pd_people, pd_image, pd_content1) values( (select nvl(max(pd_seq), 0)+1 from Tril_PRODUCT) ,#{pd_name},#{pd_price},#{pd_keyword},#{pd_startDate},#{pd_endDate},#{pd_cnt},#{pd_theme},#{pd_people},#{pd_image},#{pd_content1})
mapper.select: SELECT pd_seq, pd_name, pd_price, pd_keyword, pd_startDate, pd_endDate, pd_cnt, pd_theme, pd_people, pd_image, pd_content1, pd_location, adult_num, teenager_num, pet_num, adult_price, teenager_price, pet_price FROM ( SELECT pd_seq, pd_name, pd_price, pd_keyword, pd_startDate, pd_endDate, pd_cnt, pd_theme, pd_people, pd_image, pd_content1, pd_location, adult_num, teenager_num, pet_num, adult_price, teenager_price, pet_price, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY pd_seq ASC) AS rn FROM TRIL_PRODUCT ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY PD_SEQ ASC
select count(pd_seq) from Tril_PRODUCT where pd_seq>0
